name: Basic Vinaigrette With Mustard
keywords: dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, wine vinegar, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons or more good wine vinegar
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 large shallot (about 1 ounce), peeled and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients but the shallot in a blender and turn the machine on; a creamy emulsion will form within 30 seconds. Taste and add more vinegar a teaspoon or two at a time, until the balance tastes right.

Add the shallot, and turn the machine on and off a few times until the shallot is minced within the dressing. Taste, adjust seasoning and serve. This is best made fresh but will keep a few days refrigerated; bring back to room temperature and whisk briefly before using.
